name: Goblona
description:
LEFT MOUSE - select a friendly npc or building

      RIGHT MOUSE - command selected npc 

      M - mute music

      A - to select all friendly npcs

      train an army of knights in your tower and fight the goblins.

      it is inevitable that the goblins will overrun you by sheer numbers.

      you can give them a good fight and try to delay them.

      or give up without a fight right now.

      the choice is yours!
